name: When user clicks on any particular movie, it should navigate to the movie details page

steps.name: When  user clicks on any movie banner from the popular movies list will be directed to movie page
Then  user should see the movie title in movie page
And  user should see the watch-time, rating and release year of the movie along with overview and play button
